tweet.text: We are back in action! How about cranking it up with some searches in #FRUS? Check out this simple search on Carlos the Jackal for an interesting Editorial Note https://t.co/UnvKzrVur6 or try one of your own at https://t.co/1ECc9ulUnu.
tweet.html: We are back in action! How about cranking it up with some searches in #FRUS? Check out this simple search on Carlos the Jackal for an interesting Editorial Note go.usa.gov/xnwuQ or try one of your own at history.state.gov/search.
